DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this phase II study is to determine the efficacy of fenretinide in the treatment of geographic atrophy (GA) in subjects with the dry form of age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
DOC.brief_title: Study of Fenretinide in the Treatment of Geographic Atrophy Associated With Dry Age-Related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: males or females, 50 to 89 years of age must have GA from AMD in one or both eyes GA due to any disease other than AMD (eg, druginduced)
